title: Wall Tiles, 1880–90
dimensions:
L x W x D (Invidually): 20 x 20 cm (7 7/8 x 7 7/8 in.)
L x W x D (Assembled): 40 x 40 cm (15 3/4 x 15 3/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of John Davison Rockefeller, Jr.
description: Comprise a square portion of a larger composition in Persian style. This unit centered with a quatrefoil design enclosed by four semicircular stems and decorated corners, details reserved in white. Underglaze colors: burnt sienna, green, two shades of blue, on white ground. Mark: "Gien", on reverse.

tombstone.epitaph:
Wall Tiles, 1880–90.
1880–90. Glazed earthenware. Gift of John Davison Rockefeller, Jr.. 1937-57-4-a/d.
